subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: For the second consecutive game, Collins had waited to use Jeurys Familia, only to put him in an awkward position with runners on base. For the second time, Familia blew the save.
snippet: For the second consecutive game, Collins had waited to use Jeurys Familia, only to put him in an awkward position with runners on base. For the second time, Familia blew the save.
